languages.text: "Ваша Милость, нижайше прошу прощения...". {n}Пытаясь услужить, Урбенд снова кланяется.{/n} "Видите ли, прямо перед вашим прибытием дворцовая стража обнаружила злоумышленников, планировавших покушение на вас. К счастью, их успели устранить до того, как какой-либо урон был причинен".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Милость, нижвайше прошу прощения, что мы не успели... прибраться к вашему визиту." {n}Пытаясь услужить, Урбенд снова кланяется.{/n} "Видите ли, прямо перед вашим прибытием дворцовая стража обнаружила злоумышленников. Этот сброд проник во дворец и собирался напасть на вас. К счастью, дворец находится под надежной защитой — стража вовремя обнаружила и устранила их. В бою злоумышленники выкрикивали непозволительную ересь против вас".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Милость, нижайше прошу прощения...". {n}Пытаясь услужить, Урбенд снова кланяется.{/n} "Видите ли, прямо перед вашим прибытием дворцовая стража обнаружила злоумышленников, планировавших покушение на вас. К счастью, их успели устранить до того, как какой-либо урон был причинен".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Urbend bows once again, trying to please you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guards have discovered the malefactors who have been planning to assassinate you. Fortunately, hey were liquidated before they could cause any harm."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

Fortunately, hey were liquidated before they could cause any harm."

Fortunately, they were destroyed before they could cause you any harm."

Fortunately, they were destroyed before they could cause you any harm."

Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「陛下、恐れながら申し上げます…」{n}ドライブステムは再度頭を下げてあなたの機嫌をとろうとする。{/n}「あの、陛下が到着する直前のことです、宮廷の警備兵が陛下暗殺を企てている犯罪者を発見しました。幸い、悪党どもは陛下に危害が及ぼす前に奴らを始末いたしました」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、恐れながら申し上げます…」{n}ドライブステムは再度頭を下げてあなたの機嫌をとろうとする。{/n}「あの、陛下が到着する直前のことです、宮廷の警備兵が陛下暗殺を企てている犯罪者を発見しました。幸い、悪党どもは陛下に危害が及ぼす前に奴らを始末いたしました」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “大人，我谦卑地祈求您的原谅……”{n}德莱夫斯塔再次殷勤地鞠了一躬。{/n}“就在您抵达之前，宫廷守卫发现了针对您的行刺计划。幸好，卫兵赶在刺客对您造成任何伤害之前，就已将其诛杀。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我谦卑地祈求您的原谅……”{n}德莱夫斯塔再次殷勤地鞠了一躬。{/n}“就在您抵达之前，宫廷守卫发现了针对您的行刺计划。幸好，卫兵赶在刺客对您造成任何伤害之前，就已将其诛杀。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Je vous demande humblement pardon, Votre Seigneurie... {n}dit Drivestem en s'inclinant une nouvelle fois servilement.{/n} Voyez-vous, peu avant votre arrivée, les gardes du palais ont découvert un complot visant à vous assassiner. Fort heureusement, les conjurés ont été neutralisés avant de pouvoir vous causer le moindre mal. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous demande humblement pardon, Votre Seigneurie... {n}dit Drivestem en s'inclinant une nouvelle fois servilement.{/n} Voyez-vous, peu avant votre arrivée, les gardes du palais ont découvert un complot visant à vous assassiner. Fort heureusement, les conjurés ont été neutralisés avant de pouvoir vous causer le moindre mal. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ruego que me perdone...». {n}Drivestem se inclina ante ti una vez más tratando de aplacarte.{/n} «Verá, justo antes de su llegada, la guardia de palacio ha descubierto un complot para asesinarle. Por suerte, acabaron con los conspiradores antes de que pudieran hacerle daño».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ruego que me perdone...». {n}Drivestem se inclina ante ti una vez más tratando de aplacarte.{/n} «Verá, justo antes de su llegada, la guardia de palacio ha descubierto un complot para asesinarle. Por suerte, acabaron con los conspiradores antes de que pudieran hacerle daño».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bitte demütigst um Verzeihung ..." {n}Drivestem verneigt sich erneut, um dir zu gefallen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, kurz vor Eurer Ankunft haben die Palastwachen ein geplantes Attentat auf Euch verhindert. Glücklicherweise wurden die Übeltäter unschädlich gemacht, ehe sie Euch schaden konnten."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich bitte demütigst um Verzeihung ..." {n}Urbend verneigt sich erneut, wohl um dir zu gefallen.{/n} "Wisst Ihr, kurz vor Eurer Ankunft haben die Palastwachen die Übeltäter entdeckt, die ein Attentat auf Euch ausführen wollten. Glücklicherweise wurden sie eliminiert, ehe sie Euch schaden konnten."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, affınıza sığınarak izah edeyim..." {n}Drivestem, bir kez daha eğilerek gönlünü almaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Saray muhafızları, siz gelmeden hemen önce şahsınıza yönelik bir suikast planını ortaya çıkardı. Neyse ki failler size zarar veremeden etkisiz hâle getirildi."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I humbly beg your pardon..." {n}Drivestem bows once again, trying to placate you.{/n} "You see, right before your arrival, the palace guard discovered a plot to assassinate you. Fortunately, the malefactors were disposed of before they could cause you any harm."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, affınıza sığınarak izah edeyim..." {n}Drivestem bir kez daha eğilerek gönlünü almaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Siz gelmeden hemen önce saray muhafızları şahsınıza yönelik bir suikast planını ortaya çıkardı. Neyse ki failler size zarar veremeden etkisiz hâle getirildi."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
